nodes.bodyText: Since this expression is only usable within the explosion prime event, my suggestion would be to add an event to the example, just to showcase proper usage and cut down on confusion.
Correct me if I'm wrong, but since this is a void method, I don't think this is needed here.

it's syntactically valid in a void method - asset doesn't return it just gives some ease to debugging when you use -ea. but yeah not needed here, any caller should be checking the allowChange method prior to calling change
